data.persona: I am a genteel woman. A lady. A person of importance that you will treat as such!
data.description:
You are in the Courtyard.
Hand carved stone surround the courtyard made by the most skilled masons with their impervious designs. Its large and quiet with hanging moss, and several beds of flowers.
There's a flower, a stone bench, a swing, a flowerpot, a Hand carved stone, and a garden bench here.
The lord and the queen are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to get out of the tunic so that I can put on a dress more suited to a woman.
data.mid_motivation: I want to hide my secret identity as a thief from the lord and the queen who are visiting the courtyard today.
data.long_motivation: I want to prevent anyone from finding out about me secret identity as a thief who steals jewels and gold from sleeping peasants so that everyone will always believe I am just a perfect noble gentlewoman.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: steal jewels and gold from sleeping peasants

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: put stolen goods on chest hidden under secret trapdoor

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the lord and the queen

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: drink drink tea with the lord and the queen
